title: Nero Video Premium 3 2018
description: Nero Video Premium 3 boasts extensive features to bring even more action to your movies. Edit, create, stream, and play back your works of art quickly and easily. Use the brilliant full HD video-editing preview, edit movies on single or dual monitors, and now even export several individual shots from a long video in one go. Achieve impressive projects with more than 800 effects, typefaces, and sounds. Enjoy your movies on your smart TV, Xbox, or other media players on your home network via the Nero Streaming Player App.
